Text:
I just noticed I mis-named a few of the episodes, you will have to rename them as you go.

Sorry and Enjoy!

Wow - again another error.  Two episodes are in one file (#15 The Joker has two episodes)- maybe how I got the names wrong.  I did this in a batch using Handbrake, it usually works perfectly - don't know how this could have happened.

Sorry again - hope you enjoy anyway.
